column4: hi, i build i beowulf cluster with mpich mpi/lam, but i dunno how to use it properly. what im suppossed to do after launching lamboot? how can i, in example, play a game dealing the job charge between the cluster?
Look at Libs, and the Intell gcc compilers for example,s a bit Off-Topic for this channel though.
Too much fer this channel. If you want to play around a bit, try some HPL benchmarks: http://www.netlib.org/benchmark/hpl/
